item.title: no more google
item.description: not sure if this is appropriately tagged, but i didn’t feel like making a new one. i figured i should probably get some notes down about moving off google. to start, i’ll get a list of the things i was able to easily replace:

item.title: net neutrality vote today
item.description: Everybody! We only have UNTIL TOMORROW to fight the FCC & the repeal of #NetNeutrality! Repealing Net Nutrality would result in an unequal access to online content including research, social/political organizing, and personal media.
